recipesJson.name: Vanilla Mint Sex (for pods nic salts)
recipesJson.author: kindground
recipesJson.description:
This is a pod/nic salt version of my vanilla peppermint recipe. It's so good and surprisingly flavorful and sweet! 

Just cool sweet mouthful of vanilla and peppermint.

reviews.text: Used in my billetbox with euc .06ohms. Very full of flavor coolness/mint doesnâ€™t overpower the creamy vanilla excellent job. Thanks for sharing
This recipe is really, really good. One of the biggest problems I've run into with pod vaping is flavor fatigue, this recipe does not suffer from it. It's like vaping a stick of gum.
